The #Taipei #smartcity project will place a digital identification system based on #IOTA’s TangleID technology. The #TangleID system solves a common conundrum relating to digital identification—linking digital identity with the non-digital identity of a real person! @iotatoken  https://t.co/0lTqvbM38d

Instead of using a #blockchain, #IOTA is based on a distributed ledger technology called a #DAG, or #Tangle, that enables data and money to be transferred via its network. Unlike blockchain, for every transaction that is added to the Tangle, two others are validated. @iotatoken  https://t.co/cfSHZvqc4L

In #IOTA, a transaction can contain about 1.2 kilobytes of data. In other words, if you have a sensor just for temperature logging or a small dataset, you can use IOTA for data transfer. This is how IOTA also ensures the integrity of the data! #Tangle #IoT #marketplace @iotatoken  https://t.co/MCcfWa3O0l
